scenes.background: [Monica] takes a deep breath and nods slightly as [Bob] resumes his pacing.
scenes.description: 'Alright, so whatâ€™s the first step? How do we divide these tasks?'

options.text: Let's write down all tasks and assign them based on everyone's strengths.
options.analysis: You suggested a structured approach focusing on individual strengths, showing good perception and social skills, though your empathy and motivation were balanced.

options.text: Maybe we can each take a task and regroup after an hour to see the progress.
options.analysis: You proposed a time-boxed approach to managing tasks, showing strong self-regulation and motivation, with balanced empathy and social skills.

options.text: Why not just divide the tasks equally and work independently?
options.analysis: You suggested a straightforward division of labor, showing strong social skills but lower self-regulation and empathy.
